text: Yesli zhe ty (o Mukhammad!) vernosh'sya po vole Allakha posle srazheniya k gruppe uklonivshikhsya ot bor'by litsemerov, i oni poprosyat tebya vzyat' ikh s toboy v drugoy pokhod, ne soglashaysya, a skazhi im: "Vy nikogda ne poydote so mnoy v pokhod i nikogda ne budete srazhat'sya s vragom vmeste so mnoy. Ved' vy otkazalis' v pervyy raz vystupit' v pokhod vmeste s nami bez uvazhitel'noy prichiny, i vy ne obratilis' k Allakhu s pokayaniyem, prosya u Nego proshcheniya. Otsizhivaytes' zhe, kak khoteli, s ostayushchimisya - invalidami, starikami, zhenshchinami i det'mi
